name: The Wild Wild Zombie West
description:
Welcome to the Wild Wild ZOMBIE West

"In a small town called "Trinity", inside a tiny prison, You sit - a lonely Cowboy waiting for his excecution... 

Every hour feels like a minute, and every minute goes by with a blink of an eye.

The more you wait, the more you realise that something doesnt seem right, someone should have came already - you're not complaining though, after all - its in your best interest.

Suddenly! you hear a huge explosion..."

This is plain ol' text based game with 1-3 options on almost each scenario.

There are 4 possible endings:

  1. 3 are deaths and 
  2. 1 is where you live.  dont worry, its not the end....

Hope you enjoy it! 

Its just the start of the the story for this Cowboy...
